arStrings.szText:
{c_important}Meteor{/c} now has {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional charge with a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} second Charge Cooldown instead of a Mana cost, and drops {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} additional meteors around the target.

{c_important}Meteor's{/c} Enchantment Effect and Enhanced {c_important}Meteor{/c} drop {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 3"]{/c} additional meteor.
